name: obsidian-color-master
description: Full control of Obsidian color CSS variables with profiles, import/export, bilingual UI, and Force Mode to override themes.

scripts.dev: npm run build && copy main.js "C:\Users\user\Documents\Obsidian\My Notes\.obsidian\plugins\obsidian-color-master" && copy styles.css "C:\Users\user\Documents\Obsidian\My Notes\.obsidian\plugins\obsidian-color-master" && copy manifest.json "C:\Users\user\Documents\Obsidian\My Notes\.obsidian\plugins\obsidian-color-master"

author: Yazan Ammar
